name: Unicom Communications
description:
Based in Dundee and Aberdeen, Scotland, Unicom Communications has a global presence working throughout Europe, the Americas and the Middle East. Our experience in 3D animations, 3D visualisations and digital presentations puts Unicom Communications at the forefront of digital technology. Unicom’s primary markets include Oil & Gas, Defence, Medical, Manufacturing and Engineering.
With a background of design, marketing, engineering and architecture, the team at Unicom provides clients with a varied skill-set. Over the past few years Unicom have developed a reputation for quality, creativity and reliability through investment in staff and technology. It’s the aim of Unicom Communications to exceed customer expectation and add value to client projects.
